Truck driver Tony Wells almost four times the limit, blames ‘windy day’ for drifting across highway https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/truck-driver-tony-wells-almost-four-times-the-limit-blames-windy-day-for-drifting-across-highway/OSHRVNQFENADHPJTSK4HYLZ55E/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/truck-driver-tony-wells-almost-four-times-the-limit-blames-windy-day-for-drifting-across-highway/OSHRVNQFENADHPJTSK4HYLZ55E/ Tracy NealThe driver, who stopped twice to urinate on the road, was nearly four times the limit. Photo / Tracy Neal
